sentence.Network_en: They consistently rejected the demand to remove US troops.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一再拒绝撤走美国部队的要求。

sentence.Network_en: He is accused of consistently and callously ill-treating his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被指控一直虐待妻子，下手狠毒。

sentence.Network_en: The company has consistently denied it had knowingly broken arms embargoes.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家公司一直否认自己是有意违反武器禁运规定。

高二英语必修五单词列表_百度文库 ... tense n. 时态 consistent adj. 一致的 Unit 3 aspect n. 方面.

entry.tran: (行为、态度等)一贯的，一致的，始终如一的
entry.def: Someone who is  consistent always behaves in the same way, has the same attitudes towards people or things, or achieves the same level of success in something.

example.ex: Becker has never been the most consistent of players anyway.
example.tran: 不管怎么说，贝克尔从来就不是表现最为稳定的球员。
他对自由贸易始终如一的支持

entry.tran: （观点等）一致的，吻合的，不矛盾的
entry.def: If one fact or idea is consistent with another, they do not contradict each other.

example.ex: This result is consistent with the findings of Garnett & Tobin...
example.tran: 这个结果与加尼特托宾公司的调查结果一致。

example.ex: New goals are not always consistent with the existing policies.
example.tran: 新目标并不总是与现行政策一致。

entry.tran: (观点或看法)前后一致的，连贯的
entry.def: An argument or set of ideas that is consistent is one in which no part contradicts or conflicts with any other part.

example.ex: These are clear consistent policies which we are putting into place.
example.tran: 这些就是我们正在付诸实施的政策，不但清楚而且前后一致。

means.word_mean: 1. in a systematic or consistent manner;

auth_sentence.content: Yorke remains consistently inventive, whatever company he keeps.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yorke remains consistently inventive, whatever company he keeps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yorke remains consistently inventive, whatever company he keeps.

auth_sentence.content: On the contrary, they consistently confirm the Bible.
auth_sentence.res_content: On the contrary, they consistently confirm the Bible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On the contrary, they consistently confirm the Bible.

auth_sentence.content: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.
auth_sentence.res_content: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.

Sentence.sentence: But economists who study the relationship between money and happiness have consistently found that, above a certain income, the two do not reliably correlate.
If Americans saved more and spent less, consistently over time, they wouldn't have to worry about all that.
What allowed him to remain so consistently ahead of the curve

sentences.en: He has consistently denied murdering his estranged wife.
sentences.cn: 他自始至终否认谋杀了分居的妻子。

sentences.en: The minister has consistently opposed any relaxation in the law.
sentences.cn: 部长一向反对法律上的任何放宽。

sentences.en: The Ministry of Finance consistently overestimated its budget deficits.
sentences.cn: 财政部一贯高估预算赤字。

sentences.en: To write a novel,one must keep pegging away at it consistently.
sentences.cn: 要写小说,必须不断辛勤劳动。
